column5: GDX GLD GDXJ SPY Market is up 15 and Gold is barely down Shorts would have hammered GLD and GDX a few weeks ago My guess is that there are still a lot of people caught short in futures and miners 1335 held for now but no doubt gold bears are on edge
NUGT JNUG GDX GDXJ miners will benefit from market rally and rate cut so win win situation here
